title: Senior Application Security Engineer
description: We're looking for a Senior Application Security Engineer to lead our application security initiatives. You will work with development teams to build security into the SDLC, conduct security assessments, and mentor junior security engineers.
responsibilities: Lead security architecture reviews and threat modeling sessions
Conduct advanced penetration testing on web and mobile applications
Design and implement security automation tools and CI/CD security pipelines
Mentor junior security engineers and developers on secure coding practices
Perform security code reviews and static/dynamic analysis
Develop and maintain security testing frameworks
Collaborate with DevOps to implement DevSecOps practices
Stay ahead of emerging threats and attack techniques
Present security findings to technical and executive audiences
requirements: 5+ years of experience in application security or similar role
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Cybersecurity, or related field
Deep understanding of web application vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, etc.)
Expert-level knowledge of at least two programming languages (JavaScript, Python, Java, Go)
Experience with security testing tools (Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, Metasploit)
Strong understanding of modern web frameworks (React, Next.js, Angular, Node.js)
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and container security
Industry certifications such as OSCP, GWAPT, or CSSLP
Proven track record of identifying and remediating critical vulnerabilities
interviewProcess: Technical interview with security team (1 hour)
System design and architecture discussion (1 hour)
Final interview with engineering leadership (45 min)
